mail_body:
Hi [Employee Name],

Hope you're having a great week!

Following up on our initial conversation, I'm excited to schedule your property viewing in London. We've found a few furnished apartments that I think you'll absolutely love, based on your preferences. 

I've blocked out some time next week for us to explore these options together. Please let me know if the proposed time works for you. If not, we can easily adjust it to fit your schedule.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon and helping you find your perfect home in London!

Best regards,

Sarah Johnson
Relocation Specialist
Global Mobility Solutions
